item.title: Vulnlab - Baby [Easy]
item.description: Recently I’ve started to explore more platforms for hacking different type of boxes and I found that xct has created vulnlab. From what I’ve explored, I have to say that I am really impressed with it and so far, I really like it. Here is my writeup for the “Baby” lab. https://www.vulnlab.com/ User / Initial Foothold Started with a nmap scan: sylsec$ nmap -p- -sT -v -A --open -T 4 --script vuln* -oN nmap.
